seed: Knowledge gap — Origins of "Excalibur" in early Welsh texts. This topic requires cross-referencing with primary Welsh manuscripts and scholarly editions of *Culhwch and Olwen* to verify any textual or linguistic evidence. A targeted web search or access to academic databases (e.g., JSTOR, Oxford Classical Texts) would be necessary to confirm or refute the name’s presence in early sources. Once verified, this entry can be added to the knowledge base with academic rigor and contextual accuracy.
